name: SMS Free mobile
description: Send SMS with the API of Free Mobile. (Free Mobile is a French mobile carrier)
instructionsHTML:
Require Gladys >= 3.0.0

Installation

To install this module, you need to :

  • Install the module in Gladys
  • In Gladys, go to "Parameters" => "Parameters" => "User parameters" in the dashboard, and create parameters:
    • smsfree_user API user
    • smsfree_pass API pass
  • Go to "Parameters" in the dashboard, then "Notifications", and you can here put smsfree in the list of notification handlers
instructionsMarkDown:
Require Gladys >= 3.0.0

## Installation

To install this module, you need to :

- Install the module in Gladys
- In Gladys, go to "Parameters" => "Parameters" => "User parameters" in the dashboard, and create parameters:
 - `smsfree_user` API user
 - `smsfree_pass` API pass
- Go to "Parameters" in the dashboard, then "Notifications", and you can here put smsfree in the list of notification handlers
